author: cms-sw
body: Due to a typo ( https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw-config/commit/229fca01867107f8dcdbed23b36bd2bde569c34e#diff-3e9a48949cfadd3ba1749276c06334910c0478305c1d8554a72001f7dbb15c7b ) TSAN IBs were not running edm class checks tools. This shoudl fix this issue.
title: [BuildRules] Fix TSAN build issues
